    Enclosing interface:
    Html4

    public static interface Html4.Element<This>
extends HtmlPiece
    Html4 element.

    This interface contains convenience method to set common attributes or non-standard attributes.

    Most methods return `this` for method chaining.

    • Method Summary

      Abstract Methods
      CharSequence getAttribute(String name)
      Get the attribute value.
      CharSequence setAttribute(String name, CharSequence value)
      Set the attribute value.
      Default Methods
      CharSequence attr(String name)
      Get the attribute value.
      This attr(String name, CharSequence value)
      Set the attribute value.
      This attr(String name, boolean value)
      Set a boolean attribute.
      This attr(String name, int value)
      Set an integer attribute.
      This on(String event, CharSequence script)
      Set an event attribute.
      This class_add(CharSequence clazz)
      Add a new class to the "class" attribute.
      This class_(CharSequence value)
      Set attribute class="{value}".
      This dir(CharSequence value)
      Set attribute dir="{value}".
      This id(CharSequence value)
      Set attribute id="{value}".
      This lang(CharSequence value)
      Set attribute lang="{value}".
      This style(CharSequence value)
      Set attribute style="{value}".
      This title(CharSequence value)
      Set attribute title="{value}".

      • Methods inherited from interface bayou.html.HtmlPiece

        isBlock, render, render

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        CharSequence getAttribute(String name)
        Get the attribute value. See HtmlElement.getAttribute(name).

      • setAttribute

        CharSequence setAttribute(String name,
                          CharSequence value)
        Set the attribute value. See HtmlElement.setAttribute(name, value).

      • attr

        default CharSequence attr(String name)
        Get the attribute value. Equivalent to getAttribute(name)

      • attr

        default This attr(String name,
                  CharSequence value)
        Set the attribute value. Has the safe effect of setAttribute(name).

      • attr

        default This attr(String name,
                  boolean value)
        Set a boolean attribute. Equivalent to `attr(name, value?"":null)`.

      • attr

        default This attr(String name,
                  int value)
        Set an integer attribute. Equivalent to `attr(name, ""+value)`.

      • on

        default This on(String event,
                CharSequence script)
        Set an event attribute. Equivalent to `attr("on"+event, script)`.

        For example,

             _a().on("click", "alert('boo')"); // <a onclick="alert('boo')">

      • class_add

        default This class_add(CharSequence clazz)
        Add a new class to the "class" attribute.

        For example

             DIV div = _div();    // <div>
     div.class_add("c1"); // <div class="c1">
     div.class_add("c2"); // <div class="c1 c2">

        If `clazz` is null or empty, this method has no effect.

      • class_

        default This class_(CharSequence value)
        Set attribute class="{value}".

      • dir

        default This dir(CharSequence value)
        Set attribute dir="{value}".

      • id

        default This id(CharSequence value)
        Set attribute id="{value}".

      • lang

        default This lang(CharSequence value)
        Set attribute lang="{value}".

      • style

        default This style(CharSequence value)
        Set attribute style="{value}".

      • title

        default This title(CharSequence value)
        Set attribute title="{value}".
